select m.member_id,m.nikename,m.sex,m.email,m.create_time,m.points from t_member m,t_tuike k
k.is_check = 0 AND k.member_id = m.member_id AND k.state = "INIT"
and ( q.title like '%${searchKey}%')
order by
${orderColumn} ${orderType},
k.create_time desc

select k.tuike_id,m.nikename,k.create_time,k.available_balance,k.freeze_balance,k.code,k.share_count,k.buy_count from t_member m,t_tuike k
k.is_check = 1 AND k.member_id = m.member_id AND k.state = "CHECKED"
and ( q.title like '%${searchKey}%')
order by
${orderColumn} ${orderType},
k.create_time desc
